paper.title: Something About All or Nothing (Transforms)

author.org: Department of Combinatorics and Optimization, University of Waterloo, Waterloo Onatrio, N2L 3G1, Canada#TAB#

paper.abstract: In this short note, we study all-or-nothing transforms, which were recently proposed by Rivest as a mode of operation for block ciphers. We study transforms of this type that provide unconditional security. A simple construction for linear transforms is given, and some existence and non-existence results for general transforms are derived from a combinatorial characterization of these objects.
